Container.Name: media-optimizer
Container.Overview: Analyze your Sonarr and Radarr libraries to identify space hogs, codec upgrade candidates, and export data for review. Features smart sorting by size, MB/minute, codec, resolution, and year. Export to CSV or JSON. Matching Sonarr blue and Radarr orange themes.
